document.full_text: victoria azarenka of belarus defeated an error-plagued russian maria sharapova 6-1 6-4 on saturday to win the sony ericsson open for the second time in three years.
document.title: azarenka beats sharapova to win miami title
lines_and_colors: victoria azarenka of belarus defeated an error-plagued russian maria sharapova 6-1 6-4 on saturday to win the sony ericsson open for the second time in three years.
